languages.text: {n}На лице Хальбрандта еще свежи последствия встречи с каменным лбом Ульфара. Руку молодой Волк держит на топоре.{/n}
{n}The traces of Halbrandt's encounter with Ulfar's rock-hard forehead are still fresh on his face. The young Wolf rests his hand on his axe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}На лице Хальбрандта еще свежи последствия встречи с каменным лбом Ульфара. Руку молодой Волк держит на топоре.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La cara de Halbrandt aún muestra las marcas de su encontronazo con la pétrea frente de Ulfar. El joven lobo apoya la mano sobre su hacha.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The traces of Halbrandt's encounter with Ulfar's rock-hard forehead are still fresh on his face. The young Wolf rests his hand on his axe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La cara de Halbrandt aún muestra las marcas de su encontronazo con la pétrea frente de Ulfar. El joven lobo apoya la mano sobre su hacha.{/n}
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: {n}哈尔布兰特的脸上，依然残留着被乌尔法坚硬如石的前额磕出来的痕迹。这位年轻的野狼随后将手搭在了斧头上。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The traces of Halbrandt's encounter with Ulfar's rock-hard forehead are still fresh on his face. The young Wolf rests his hand on his axe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}哈尔布兰特的脸上，依然残留着被乌尔法坚硬如石的前额磕出来的痕迹。这位年轻的野狼随后将手搭在了斧头上。{/n}
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: {n}ハルブラントがウルファーの岩のように硬い額にぶつかった痕跡は、今もまだ彼の顔に鮮明に残っている。若いウルフは手の斧に触れている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The traces of Halbrandt's encounter with Ulfar's rock-hard forehead are still fresh on his face. The young Wolf rests his hand on his axe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハルブラントがウルファーの岩のように硬い額にぶつかった痕跡は、今もまだ彼の顔に鮮明に残っている。若いウルフは手の斧に触れている。{/n}
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: {n}Les traces du heurt d'Halbrandt avec le front dur comme la pierre d'Ulfar sont encore bien visibles sur son visage. Le jeune Wolf garde la main posée sur sa hache.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The traces of Halbrandt's encounter with Ulfar's rock-hard forehead are still fresh on his face. The young Wolf rests his hand on his axe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les traces du heurt d'Halbrandt avec le front dur comme la pierre d'Ulfar sont encore bien visibles sur son visage. Le jeune Wolf garde la main posée sur sa hache.{/n}
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: {n}Die Spuren von Halbrandts Begegnung mit Ulfars steinharter Stirn sind auf seinem Gesicht noch ganz frisch. Der junge Wolf lässt seine Hand auf seiner Axt ruhen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The traces of Halbrandt's encounter with Ulfar's rock-hard forehead are still fresh on his face. The young Wolf rests his hand on his axe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Spuren von Halbrandts Begegnung mit Ulfars steinharter Stirn sind auf seinem Gesicht noch ganz frisch. Der junge Wolf lässt seine Hand auf seiner Axt ruhen.{/n}
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: {n}Ulfar'ın taş gibi alnının Halbrandt'ın yüzünde bıraktığı izler hâlâ duruyor. Genç Kurt, elini baltasından ayırmıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The traces of Halbrandt's encounter with Ulfar's rock-hard forehead are still fresh on his face. The young Wolf rests his hand on his axe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Halbrandt'ın Ulfar'ın taş gibi alnıyla karşılaşmasının izleri hâlâ yüzünde duruyor. Genç Kurt, elini baltasından ayırmıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC
